roleset.name: unknown
roleset.note: Based on Thyme data. Comparison to specify.01-v. No VN or FN classes. Framed by Nick and Katie.

example.name: WIth arg 0 - arg 0 may be rare
example.text: Congressmen Ryan's Medicare proposal and his unspecified cuts in everything else are then almost controvercial.

example.name: If 'he' is not the unspecifier, but part of the thing unspecified (his good works), Concatenate.
example.text: The community admires him for his unspecified good works.
